title: Pediatric Decentralization of ART in South Africa
inclusion: initiated ART at designated facility during study period
exclusion: Not started ART before end of specified period
Lost to follow-up before enrolment window
notes: Decentralisation / delivery of routine ART services to primary care; suitable for pediatric trial-matching (adherence / viral-load endpoints).

title: TB-Speed Decentralisation (childhood TB diagnostic decentralisation)
region: Multiple (Cambodia, Cameroon, Côte d’Ivoire, Mozambique, Sierra Leone, Uganda)
inclusion: Child with presumptive pulmonary TB (symptoms consistent with TB)
exclusion: Parent/guardian does not consent to study-specific sample collection
notes: Decentralisation of TB diagnostic capacity to PHC/DH levels; useful for diagnostic / screening DCT elements.

title: East Africa Point of Care Viral Load Study (EAPoC-VL)
inclusion: People receiving ART requiring viral load monitoring
Age >= 18 (adult cohorts) — check site-specific age criteria
notes: Point-of-care decentralised viral load monitoring to improve retention and suppression — good match for remote monitoring trials.

title: Delivery Optimization for Pre-Exposure Prophylaxis (Decentralized service delivery)
inclusion: At-risk individuals eligible for PrEP per local guidelines
exclusion: Currently enrolled in conflicting prevention trial
notes: Decentralized home/remote delivery model for PrEP — useful to demo DCT recruitment and remote interventions.

title: Urine Tenofovir Point-of-care Test to Identify Patients in TDF-based regimens
notes: Diagnostic point-of-care test for adherence; suitable for remote monitoring DCT use-cases.
